benchmark_details.name: XFINBENCH
benchmark_details.overview: XFINBENCH is a novel benchmark designed to evaluate the ability of Large Language Models (LLMs) in solving complex, knowledge-intensive financial problems across diverse topics and multi-modal contexts.

purpose_and_intended_users.goal: To evaluate LLMâ€™s ability to solve complex and knowledge-intensive financial problems with multi-modal context.

data.source: The dataset is constructed from graduate-level finance textbooks.
data.annotation: Manual annotation and automated annotation using GPT-4o.

methodology.calculation: Metrics are calculated based on the performance of LLMs on various tasks within the benchmark.
methodology.interpretation: Good performance is indicated by high accuracy in solving complex financial problems.
methodology.baseline_results: o1 is the best-performing text-only model with an overall accuracy of 67.3%.
methodology.validation: XFINBENCH includes a validation set of 1,000 examples to support model development validation.

ethical_and_legal_considerations.data_licensing: Data is sourced from openly available textbooks while adhering to copyright regulations.
